tasks.label: cicsc:autoassign:stop
tasks.command: bash -lc 'if [[ -f state/autoassign.pid ]]; then kill "$(cat state/autoassign.pid)" && rm -f state/autoassign.pid; echo "Stopped autoassign"; else pkill -f "control-plane/autoassign.sh --loop" >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "Stopped autoassign" || echo "No autoassign process found"; fi'
